edge: Shahid Kapoor portrays the character of Haider Meer in this movie.
Anshuman Malhotra plays the role of Young Haider in the movie.
Tabu acts as Ghazala Meer, who is Haider's mother in the film.
Kay Kay Menon portrays Khurram Meer, who is Haider's paternal uncle in the movie.
Shraddha Kapoor plays Ophelia/Horatio in this film, and her character's name is Arshia Lone.
Irrfan Khan plays the character of Roohdaar in the movie.
Narendra Jha acts as Dr. Hilaal Meer, who is Haider's father in the film.
Kulbhushan Kharbanda plays the character of Hussain Meer in this movie.
Lalit Parimoo and Pervez Lone both act as Polonius in the film.
Ashish Vidyarthi portrays Brigadier T. S. Murthy in the movie.
Rajat Bhatt plays Salman 1, who is a courtier in this film.
Saqib Sheikh's character in the movie is known as 'Chocolate boy'.
Mohammad Shah portrays Fortinbras in this film.
Lankesh Bhardwaj plays the role of an interrogation officer in the movie.
